product_summary.objective: To provide financial security and independence to women's families in case of premature demise.
highlights: Special premium rates for women (lower than men)
Coverage for homemakers and working women
Critical Illness cover for female-specific illnesses

plan_variants.description: Sum assured remains constant throughout the tenure.
Sum assured increases by a specified rate annually.
Sum assured decreases over time (often used for loan cover).
Premiums refunded if the insured survives the policy term.

core_benefits.description: Sum assured paid to the nominee on death. Can be lump sum, monthly income, or combination.
Optional riders for critical illness (e.g., breast/cervical cancer).
Premiums deductible under 80C (up to ₹1.5L). Death benefit tax-free under 10(10D).

discounts: 16% Discount on 1st year premium (mentioned in summary)
Lower premium rates for women generally

riders: Critical Illness Benefit Rider (covers female-specific cancers)

services: Discounts on Medicines and Lab Bookings

sample_illustrations.description: ₹1 Crore cover for 22 year old female, non-smoker, 30 year term

compliance_rules.disclaimer: Insurance is subject to terms and conditions. Please read the sales brochure and policy document carefully before purchase.
compliance_rules.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious phone calls and fraudulent offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_rules.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are subject to provisions of Section 80C and Section 10(10D) of the Income Tax Act, 1961. Consult your tax advisor.

retrieval_chunks.text: Term insurance for women offers financial protection for families, covering independent women and homemakers against premature demise.
Women enjoy lower premium rates due to higher life expectancy. Plans start around ₹13/day for ₹1 Crore cover.
Riders available for female-specific critical illnesses like breast and cervical cancer.
Premiums are tax-deductible up to ₹1.5 lakh under Section 80C. Death benefits are tax-free under Section 10(10D).
Option to receive all premiums back if the policyholder survives the policy tenure.
Working women, entrepreneurs, and homemakers seeking to secure their family's financial future.
